name: shopify-dawn
description: Created based on the Shopify Dawn theme project. Added custom components, tailwindCss and other easy-to-use features.

scripts.start: gulp init && shopify theme dev & gulp watch & npx tailwindcss -o ./assets/tailwindbuild.css --watch --minify
scripts.build: gulp compressJs & gulp compileSass & npx tailwindcss -o ./assets/tailwindbuild.css --minify
